explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the application of artificial intelligence, specifically deep learning models, in stock return forecasting, which falls under the broader category of machine learning.
explanations.deep learning: The study evaluates the performance of various deep learning models, including TCNs, RNNs, LSTM, and GRU models, in forecasting stock returns.
explanations.neural network: The paper focuses on neural network-based models such as RNNs, LSTM, and GRU for stock return forecasting.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The paper explicitly mentions the use of recurrent neural network (RNN) models for stock return forecasting.
explanations.long short-term memory: The study evaluates the performance of long short-term memory (LSTM) models in stock return forecasting.
explanations.LSTM: The paper includes LSTM as one of the deep learning models evaluated for stock return forecasting.
